Interface ClassFile.Option

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClassFile.AttributeMapperOption, ClassFile.ClassHierarchyResolverOption
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassFile.AttributesProcessingOption, ClassFile.ConstantPoolSharingOption, ClassFile.DeadCodeOption, ClassFile.DeadLabelsOption, ClassFile.DebugElementsOption, ClassFile.LineNumbersOption, ClassFile.ShortJumpsOption, ClassFile.StackMapsOption
Enclosing interface:
ClassFile
public static sealed interface ClassFile.Option permits ClassFile.AttributeMapperOption, ClassFile.ClassHierarchyResolverOption, ClassFile.ConstantPoolSharingOption, ClassFile.DeadCodeOption, ClassFile.DeadLabelsOption, ClassFile.DebugElementsOption, ClassFile.LineNumbersOption, ClassFile.ShortJumpsOption, ClassFile.StackMapsOption, ClassFile.AttributesProcessingOption
An option that affects the parsing or writing of class files.
